Sql.query: select tent.tentcodigo as codigo, se.emprnomb as generador, '' as cliente, count(tentde.tentdecodi) as nrodia, sum(tentde.tentdesumadia) as Energia from trn_trans_entrega tent join trn_trans_entrega_detalle tentde on tent.tentcodi = tentde.tentcodi join vw_si_empresa se on tent.emprcodi = se.emprcodi where tent.pericodi = :pericodi and tent.tentversion = :version and barrcodi = :barrcodi group by tent.tentcodigo, se.emprnomb UNION select tret.tretcodigo as codigo, ge.emprnomb as generador, ce.emprnomb as cliente, count(tretde.tretdecodi) as nrodia, sum(tretde.tretdesumadia) as Energia from trn_trans_retiro tret join trn_trans_retiro_detalle tretde on tret.tretcodi = tretde.tretcodi join vw_si_empresa ge on tret.genemprcodi = ge.emprcodi join vw_si_empresa ce on tret.cliemprcodi = ce.emprcodi where tret.pericodi = :pericodi and tret.tretversion = :version and barrcodi = :barrcodi group by tret.tretcodigo, ge.emprnomb, ce.emprnomb order by 1, 2, 3

select tent.tentcodigo as codigo, se.emprnomb as generador, '' as cliente, count(tentde.tentdecodi) as nrodia, sum(tentde.tentdesumadia) as Energia from trn_trans_entrega tent join trn_trans_entrega_detalle tentde on tent.tentcodi = tentde.tentcodi join vw_si_empresa se on tent.emprcodi = se.emprcodi where tent.pericodi = :pericodi and tent.tentversion = :version and barrcodi = :barrcodi and tent.tentcodigo = :codigo group by tent.tentcodigo, se.emprnomb UNION select tret.tretcodigo as codigo, ge.emprnomb as generador, ce.emprnomb as cliente, count(tretde.tretdecodi) as nrodia, sum(tretde.tretdesumadia) as Energia from trn_trans_retiro tret join trn_trans_retiro_detalle tretde on tret.tretcodi = tretde.tretcodi join vw_si_empresa ge on tret.genemprcodi = ge.emprcodi join vw_si_empresa ce on tret.cliemprcodi = ce.emprcodi where tret.pericodi = :pericodi and tret.tretversion = :version and barrcodi = :barrcodi and tret.tretcodigo = :codigo group by tret.tretcodigo, ge.emprnomb, ce.emprnomb
